trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Eurydome has a use for your unique charms.
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Bureau of the Architect envoy.
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the collection of crystallized concepts to Eurydome.
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_000<tab>Oh my, aren't you adorable! Hmm... Actually, there's something you might be able to help me with.
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_001<tab>A visitor from the Bureau of the Architect has arrived at Propylaion to deliver new concepts. I would like you to offer her the warmest of welcomes!

TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_002<tab>Normally, we'd have our own familiars attend to such duties, but most of them are already entertaining other guests. There's been rather a lot lately, you see.

TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_003<tab>On the other hand, this would be the perfect opportunity to show her an entirely new and─What's a nice way to put this?─<var 1A 02 /var>idiosyncratic<var 1A 01 /var> familiar. That being you, of course. I'm sure she'd be delighted to meet you!
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_005<tab>Oh, you'd like some sort of description would you? Well, I believe she has a white mask and long, black robes. Does that narrow it down?

TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_BUREAUSTAFF04284_000_010<tab>What a pleasant surprise! You must be one of the most <var 09 E948 ((staggeringly generic)) ((curiously elongated)) ((eminently portable)) ((excessively energetic)) ((astonishingly brawny)) ((bafflingly prickly)) ((luxuriously coiffured)) ((anatomically inexplicable)) /var> familiars I've ever seen!

TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_BUREAUSTAFF04284_000_011<tab>Eurydome chose her representative well, it would appear. As a matter of fact, I too have an errand to ask of you, namely the delivery of these concepts.

TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_BUREAUSTAFF04284_000_012<tab>I have brought them all the way from the Akadaemia Anyder. Three aquatic fauna specimens from the Words of Mitron and one flora sample from the Words of Halmarut. All <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> fascinating, as my counterparts here will soon discover.

TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_BUREAUSTAFF04284_000_013<tab>It would also be prudent to remind Eurydome not to let their captivating nature distract her from making her observations. Well then, there's no time like the present!
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_020<tab>I trust our guest was as enamored with you as I am?
TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_021<tab>New concepts for us? And fascinating to the point of being distracting? What an odd thing to warn me about, though it does all sound rather intriguing.

TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_022<tab>The Akadaemia Anyder always produces concepts of the most outstanding quality, and I'm eager to learn what treats we have in store on this occasion. Let me see...

TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_023<tab>Hmm... From the Words of Mitron we have what seems to be an aquatic mollusk capable of storing aether in its shell. I can only guess as to what purpose that would serve, but I daresay all will become abundantly clear in due course.

TEXT_AKTKZG009_04284_EURYDOME_000_024<tab>Oh, I do apologize! I already find myself mesmerized by these concepts, just as our visitor predicted. For your part in bringing me these wonders, you have my thanks.
